00035 /*
00036 *       An object providing a r.n. transformation table to other objects.
00037 *       There are several possibilities to specify the distribution:
00038 *
00039 *       Distribution dist: FILE="file";
00040 *               // read distribution from an ASCII file, file format:
00041 *               // # for every X value (ascending order, values with zero p(x) can be omitted):
00042 *               //      x       p       # comment
00043 *       Distribution dist: TABLE=(2,0.5),(5,0.5);
00044 *               // distribution directly given in the simulator input file
00045 *       Distribution dist: DISTRIB(i = 1 to imax, 1.0/imax);
00046 *               // distribution specified by a formula
00047 *       Distribution dist: GEOMETRIC(E=20.5);
00048 *               // geometrical distribution (shifted by one, i.e. p(0) == 0)
00049 *       Distribution dist: BINOMIAL(N=10,P=0.3);
00050 *               // binomial distribution (shifted by one, i.e. p(0) == 0)
00051 *
00052 *       In all cases, the sum of the values is checked against accuracy DISTR_ERR
00053 */
00054 
00055 #ifndef _DISTRIB_H_
00056 #define _DISTRIB_H_
00057 
00058 #include "defs.h"
00059 #include <string>
00060 #include <stdio.h>
00061 #define DISTR_ERR       (1.0e-5)        // max. inconsistency of the given distribution
00062 
00063 //tolua_begin

00067   DistMode,
00068   GeoMode,
00069   BinomialMode
00070 };
